name: BlackJack-21
description:
♥️♠️ Play against the computer and train your Blackjack skills! ♣️♦️

This is a simple blackjack game we made for an interview one time.

While we want to release this game with our unique touch in the future we think it is an engaging game as it is so we decided to share it with everyone here. It took us 4 days for development and 2 for planning (design UML diagrams).

Features:

  • Single player against the house
  • Hit
  • Stand
  • Double
  • Split
  • 2 decks shuffled with a cut card around the middle
  • Progress is saved between sessions

How to play Blackjack

What is a cut card? 
Wikipedia: A brightly colored plastic card that serves to mark the point after which the dealer will reshuffle the cards, and used by a player to cut the cards prior to dealing.

Coded by Roberto Bravo, additional Art by Ana Mendez. We are using the UI and Boardgame Kenney's assets. Music: www.bensound.com
